titleStmt.title: Despatch from John A. Parm to William Hunter, March 31, 1879

bibl.title: Despatch from John A. Parm to William Hunter
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

correspAction.roleName: Second Assistant U.S. Secretary of State

div1.p:
United States Consulate
Sierra Leone
31st March 1879

John A Parm
To Department of State

Abstract of Contents
Returns and Accounts for the quarter ending March 31st 1879
div1.note:
U.S. Consulate at Sierra Leone
March 31st 1879
div1.p:
To Hon W. Hunter
Second Assistant Secretary
Washington D.C.
I have the honor to transmit herewith enclosed, returns and accounts for the quarter ending March 31st 1879.

I have the honor to be
Sir
Your Obt Servant
John A. Parm
U.S. Consul
Enclosures 5 Accounts for the quarter ending March 31st

United States Consulate at
Sierra Leone March 31st 1879
Department of State, United States Dr To Jno A Parm U.S. Consul

row.cell: For Postage and Official Correspondence to and from this Consulate, for the quarter ending March 31st as per form No 118 & 119, herewith transmited
